Package com.atakmap.map.gpkg

Class GeoPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.gpkg.GeoPackage
  • public class GeoPackage
extends java.lang.Object
    Format reader class for parsing and accessing data from the OGC GeoPackage file format. For more information on GeoPackage, see http://www.geopackage.org/. To find the format specification, see http://www.opengeospatial.org/standards/geopackage.

    • Field Detail

      • GPKG_SCHEMA

        public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> GPKG_SCHEMA

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoPackage

        public GeoPackage​(java.io.File database)
        Creates a new GeoPackage object that allows access to the contents of a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database. This constructor may throw an exception if it is used to open a file that is not an SQLite database, so isGeoPackage(File) or isGeoPackage(String) should be used first to test if a file is valid.
        Parameters:
        database - File object pointing to the database that should be opened as a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database.
        Throws:
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException - If the database cannot be opened.

      • GeoPackage

        public GeoPackage​(java.io.File database,
                  boolean readOnly)

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this GeoPackage file. No further reading may be performed after this method has been called.

      • getPackageContents

        public java.util.List<GeoPackage.ContentsRow> getPackageContents()
        Get a list of the data stored in the GeoPackage gpkg_contents table. Each entry in this list represents an individual row in the table. Each row may be either a tiles "layer" or a feature "layer" as indicated by the data_type member of the result. NOTE: Double and Integer values in the objects returned by this method my be null, and should be checked before usage.
        Returns:
        List of rows in the gpkg_contents table.

      • getPackageExtensions

        public java.util.List<GeoPackage.ExtensionsRow> getPackageExtensions()
        Get a list of the data stored in the gpgk_extensions table. Each entry in this list represents a row in the table. The values in this table are described in section 2.3.2.1.1 of the GeoPackage specification.
        Returns:
        List of rows in the gpkg_extensions table.

      • getFeatureTable

        public FeatureTable getFeatureTable​(java.lang.String featureTableName)
        Get an object allowing access to a FeatureTable by its name. This name must match a value that will have been found in the "table_name" field of an entry in the gpkg_contents table with a data_type of "features".
        Parameters:
        featureTableName - Name of the feature table to access.
        Returns:
        Object allowing read access to the data in a feature table, or null if a table with the matching name cannot be found.

      • getFile

        public java.io.File getFile()

      • getTileTable

        public TileTable getTileTable​(java.lang.String tileTableName)
        Get an object allowing access to a TileTable by its name. This name must match a value that will have been found in the "table_name" field of an entry in the gpkg_contents table with a data_type of "tiles".
        Parameters:
        tileTableName - Name of the tile table to access.
        Returns:
        Object allowing read access to the data in a tile table, or null if a table with a matching name cannot be found.

      • getSRSInfo

        public GeoPackage.SRS getSRSInfo​(int id)
        Get an entry stored in the GeoPackage gpkg_spatial_ref_sys table.
        Parameters:
        id - ID value that will be used to look up a row in the gpkg_spatial_ref_sys table. This value will be matched against the srs_id column.
        Returns:
        The specified row from the gpkg_spatial_ref_sys table, or null.

      • isGeoPackage

        public static boolean isGeoPackage​(java.lang.String file)
        Check if a file is a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database.
        Parameters:
        file - Absolute or relative path to a file on disk that should be tested to see if it is a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database.
        Returns:
        True if the file is a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database, false otherwise.

      • isGeoPackage

        public static boolean isGeoPackage​(java.io.File file)
        Check if a file is a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database.
        Parameters:
        file - File object pointing to a file on disk that should be tested to see if it is a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database.
        Returns:
        True if the file is a GeoPackage formatted SQLite database, false otherwise.
